required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Treatment Patterns And Clinical Outcomes Among Patients in Latin America Receiving First Line Palbociclib Combinations For HR+/HER2- Advanced/Metastatic Breast Cancer In Real World Settings.
clinical_study.official_title: Treatment Patterns And Clinical Outcomes Among Patients in Latin America Receiving First Line Palbociclib Combinations For HORMONE RECEPTOR POSITIVE/ HUMAN EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR RECEPTOR 2 NEGATIVE (HR+/HER2-) Advanced/Metastatic Breast Cancer In Real World Settings

brief_summary.textblock: To describe patient demographics, clinical characteristics, treatment patterns and clinical outcomes of adult female patients who have received palbociclib combination treatments as first line therapy, regardless of combination partner and labelled use in real world settings across Latin America.

primary_outcome.measure: Description of patients demographics receiving Palbociclib
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 of treatment to date of latest follow up

primary_outcome.measure: Clinical characteristics of patients receiving Palbociclib
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 of treatment to date of latest follow up

primary_outcome.measure: Adjuvant therapies received for the treatment of early or locally advanced breast cancer (Stages 0-IIIa)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From the initial diagnosis to the metastatic disease (From data collected retrospectively for 18 months)

primary_outcome.measure: To describe treatments received in the advanced/ metastatic setting, before and after palbociclib combination use.
primary_outcome.time_frame: From the initial diagnosis in the metastatic disease (From data collected retrospectively for 18 months)

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Reduced Doses of Palbociclib
primary_outcome.description: Colombia was the last country starting July 2020 and finalized October 2020

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Dose interruption of Palbociclib
primary_outcome.description: Colombia was the last country starting July 2020 and finalized October 2020

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With discontinuation of Palbociclib
primary_outcome.description: Colombia was the last country starting July 2020 and finalized October 2020

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Delay Doses of Palbociclib
primary_outcome.description: Colombia was the last country starting July 2020 and finalized October 2020

primary_outcome.measure: Supportive therapies received by patients while receiving palbociclib combination treatments
primary_outcome.description: Colombia was the last country starting July 2020 and finalized October 2020

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients who are progression free at multiple intervals (e.g.12, 18 months)
primary_outcome.description: Colombia was the last country starting July 2020 and finalized October 2020

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with Objective response rate (ORR)
primary_outcome.description: Colombia was the last country starting July 2020 and finalized October 2020

primary_outcome.time_frame: Proportion of patients alive 1- and 2-year post palbociclib combination initiation - depending on availability of follow-up data

arm_group.description: HR + /HER2- Advanced/Metastatic Breast Cancer patients in Latin America

study_pop.textblock: Retrospective medical data review of patients who have received palbociclib combination treatments as first line treatment regardless of combination partner and labelled use in Argentina, Chile, Peru, Mexico and a combined sample in Costa Rica and Panama.

criteria.textblock:
Physician inclusion criteria:
- Oncologist or gynecologist.
- Responsible for treating â‰¥4-10 (depending on country) ABC/MBC patients who meet the eligibility criteria.
- Agrees to participate in the study and complete the case report forms (CRFs) within the data collection period.
Patient inclusion criteria:
- HR+/HER2- breast cancer diagnosis with confirmed metastatic or advanced disease.
- Received palbociclib as a first line therapy.
- No prior or current enrolment in an interventional clinical trial for ABC/MBC.
- Minimum of six months of follow up data since palbociclib initiation.
Physician exclusion criteria:
- Qualified less than 2 years ago or more than 35 years ago.
- Participated in observational research for ABC/MBC in the last 3 months.
- Have not prescribed either palbociclib plus fulvestrant or palbociclib plus aromatase inhibitor as first line therapy.

facility.name: Adelphi Mill, Bollington, Cheshire, SK10 5JB, UK

clinical_study.keyword: human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 negative (HER2-)

patient_data.ipd_description: Pfizer will provide access to individual de-identified participant data and related study documents (e.g. protocol, Statistical Analysis Plan (SAP), Clinical Study Report (CSR)) upon request from qualified researchers, and subject to certain criteria, conditions, and exceptions. Further details on Pfizer's data sharing criteria and process for requesting access can be found at: https://www.pfizer.com/science/clinical_trials/trial_data_and_results/data_requests.
